title: #1482 Snickers Bar For Dinner
itunes:title: #1482 Snickers Bar For Dinner
description:
Dr. Drew opens the show telling Adam about the sickness that he's been struggling with as of late and is overwhelmed by Adam's concern. Drew then mentions a recent conversation he had for his podcast with former A&D guest Ryan Holiday, leading to a conversation on stoicism. The guys then turn to the phones and speak with their returning caller who has been attending football games around the country and reporting on the procedures.

Please Support Our Sponsors:
Subscribe to The Jordan Harbinger Show
BlindsGalore.com, tell them Adam sent you
TryFirstLeaf.com/ADS
Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
